ruleContent.content:
<js>
var tmp, sid, id;
var text = '';
var alias = {
  'tophub.today': 'tophub-today',
  'daily.zhihu': 'zhihu-daily',
  hjenglish: 'hujiang-en'
};

if (baseUrl.includes('_id')) {
  sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  id = baseUrl.match(/[^_]id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
} else {
  for (var key in alias) {
    if (baseUrl.includes(key)) {
      sid = alias[key];
      break;
    }
  }
}

switch (sid) {
  case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
    tmp = java.ajax('https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv' + id);
    java.setContent(tmp);
    text = java.getString('class.article-holder@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'zhihu-daily': {
    text = java.getString('class.content@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'hujiang-en': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.article-content@html')).replace(
      /ÔºàÁøªËØë.+Ôºâ|ÂõæÁâáÊù•Ê∫ê.+/g,
      ''
    );
    break;
  }
  case 'tophub-today': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.Zd-p-Sc@html'))
      .replace(
        /Óôí/g,
        '\n.\n                      - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -\n.\n'
      )
      .replace(/ÁΩëÈ°µÁ´ØÂè™Â±ïÁ§∫.+/, '');
    break;
  }
}

if (!text) {
  text = 'ÔΩ°‚óï‚Äø‚óïÔΩ°' + (sid ? '\n' + sid : '');
}

text;

</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var o = [];
if (!baseUrl.includes('debug')) {
  importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);

  var sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  var tmp, data;
  // title, author, tags, new, intro, cover, url
  var page = baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/);
  page = page ? page[1] : '';

  switch (sid) {
    case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
      // ÂìîÂì©ÂìîÂì©‰∏ìÊ†èÊéíË°åÊ¶ú
      function toList(str) {
        var arr = JSON.parse(str).data;
        arr.forEach(a => {
          if (o.every(v => v.id !== a.id)) {
            o.push({
              id: a.id,
              title: a.title,
              author: a.author.name,
              tags: a.categories.map(v => v.name),
              intro: a.summary,
              new: a.dynamic,
              cover: a.banner_url,
              url: baseUrl + '&id=' + a.id
            });
          }
        });
      }
      var rankUrl = 'https://api.bilibili.com/x/article/rank/list?cid=';
      // Êò®Â§©
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '3');
      toList(tmp);

      // ÂâçÂ§©
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '4');
      toList(tmp);

      // Âë®Ê¶ú
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '2');
      toList(tmp);

      // ÊúàÊ¶ú
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '1');
      toList(tmp);

      break;
    }

    case 'zhihu-daily': {
      o = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax('https://daily.zhihu.com'))
        .select('.main-content-wrap a')
        .toArray()
        .map(a => {
          var url = 'https://daily.zhihu.com' + a.attr('href');
          var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
          var author = J.select('.meta .author')
            .text()
            .replace('Ôºå', '');
          return {
            url: url,
            title: a.text(),
            cover: a.select('img').attr('src'),
            author: author,
            tags: [author],
            new: J.select('.meta .bio').text(),
            intro: J.select('.content p:first-child')
              .text()
              .trim()
          };
        })
        .filter(v => !v.title.includes('Â¶Ç‰ΩïÊ≠£Á°ÆÂú∞ÂêêÊßΩ'));
      break;
    }

    case 'hujiang-en': {
      var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com/fanyi/shuangyu';

      url += page ? '_' + page + '/' : '/';

      var groups = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url))
        .select('.left-content .sp-article-module')
        .toArray()
        .forEach(list => {
          var defaulCover = list.select('img').attr('data-src');
          list
            .select('a')
            .toArray()
            .forEach(a => {
              var title = a.text().replace('ÊúâÂ£∞ÂèåËØ≠ÁæéÊñáÔºö', '');

              if (/1„ÄÅ‰ºòÊÉ†ÁßíÊùÄ|Ëã±ËØ≠ËØæÁ®ã/.test(title)) return;

              var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com' + a.attr('href');
              var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url)).select('.module-article');
              var cover = J.select('#J-article-content img:first-child').attr(
                'src'
              );
              cover = String(cover).trim();
              var content = J.select(
                '#J-article-content div[class*=langs]'
              ).html();
              var author = J.select('.info span:first-child').text();
              var trans = J.select('#J-article-content')
                .html()
                .match(/Ôºà(ÁøªËØëÔºö.+)Ôºâ/);
              var tags = [author];
              if (trans) {
                tags.push(trans[1]);
              }
              o.push({
                cover: cover || defaulCover,
                title: title,
                url: url,
                author: author.replace('‰ΩúËÄÖÔºö', ''),
                tags: tags,
                new: J.select('.info span:nth-child(2)').text(),
                intro: content.slice(0, 500) + '...'
              });
            });
        });

      break;
    }

    case 'tophub-today': {
      var p = page ? '?p=' + page : '';
      var baseurl = 'https://tophub.today';

      function toList(url, nav) {
        var list = [];
        var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
        var tcs = J.select('.bc-tc').toArray();
        var ccs = J.select('.bc-cc').toArray();
        tcs.forEach((tc, i) => {
          var cc = ccs[i];
          var cds = cc.select('.cc-cd').toArray();
          cds.forEach(cd => {
            var title = cd.select('.cc-cd-lb').text();
            var tag = cd.select('.cc-cd-sb-st').text();
            var links = cd.select('.nano-content a').toArray();
            var intro = links
              .map((link, i) => i + 1 + '. ' + link.select('.t').text())
              .join('\n---\n');
            list.push({
              cover: cd.select('.cc-cd-lb img').attr('src'),
              title: title + ' - ' + tag,
              url: baseurl + cd.select('.cc-cd-is a').attr('href'),
              tags: [nav],
              new: cd.select('.i-h').text(),
              intro: intro
            });
          });
        });
        return list;
      }

      var navs = {
        ÁªºÂêà: 'news',
        ÁßëÊäÄ: 'tech',
        Â®±‰πê: 'ent',
        Á§æÂå∫: 'community'
      };

      var lists = [];
      for (var name in navs) {
        var list = toList(baseurl + '/c/' + navs[name] + p, name);
        lists.push(list);
      }
      lists[0].forEach((v, i) => {
        lists.forEach((l, j) => {
          o.push(lists[j][i]);
        });
      });
    }
  }
}

o;

</js>

<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//ÂàõÂª∫‰∏§‰∏™Á©∫Êï∞ÁªÑ
json=[];json2=[];

//Âà§ÂÆöjsonÈáåÊòØÂê¶ÊúâitemsÂèñÂâç10‰∏™ÁªìÊûú
if(JSON.parse(result).items){
json=JSON.parse(result).items.slice(0,10);}

//Âä†ËΩΩ‰ΩúËÄÖÊêúÁ¥¢È°µÈù¢Âπ∂ËΩ¨‰∏∫json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/search?keyword='+key+'&type=2&page='+page+'&searchType=2&sortMode=DESC'));

//Âà§ÂÆöjsonÈáåÊòØÂê¶ÊúâitemsÂèñÂâç10‰∏™ÁªìÊûú
if(json1.items){
json2=json1.items
}

//‰π¶ÂêçÊêúÁ¥¢ÂàóË°®‰∏é‰ΩúËÄÖÊêúÁ¥¢ÂàóË°®ÊãºÊé•
list=json.concat(json2);

//ËøîÂõûjsonÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤
result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//ÂàõÂª∫‰∏§‰∏™Á©∫Êï∞ÁªÑ
json=[];json2=[];

//Âà§ÂÆöjsonÈáåÊòØÂê¶Êúâitems
if(JSON.parse(result).items){
json=JSON.parse(result).items;}

//Âä†ËΩΩ‰ΩúËÄÖÊêúÁ¥¢È°µÈù¢Âπ∂ËΩ¨‰∏∫json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/search?keyword='+key+'&type=2&page='+page+'&searchType=2&sortMode=DESC'));

//Âà§ÂÆöjsonÈáåÊòØÂê¶Êúâitems
if(json1.items){
json2=json1.items
}

//‰π¶ÂêçÊêúÁ¥¢ÂàóË°®‰∏é‰ΩúËÄÖÊêúÁ¥¢ÂàóË°®ÊãºÊé•
list=json.concat(json2);
Json=[];

//Âà§Êñ≠ÊêúÁ¥¢ÁªìÊûúÊòØÂê¶Âê´ÂÖ≥ÈîÆËØç
for(i in list){
if((list[i].novelname.indexOf(key)>-1||list[i].authorname.indexOf(key)>-1) && list[i].novelClass.indexOf('Êú™Áü•-Êú™Áü•-Êú™Áü•-Êú™Áü•')==-1){
Json.push(list[i])
}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

	latest: o('.block_txt2 p:eq(7)').replace(/^(Ê≠£Êñá|VIPÁ´†ËäÇ|ÊúÄÊñ∞Á´†ËäÇ)?(\s+|_)|[\(Ôºà„Äê].*[Ê±ÇÊõ¥Ë∞¢‰πêÂèëÊé®].*/g, ''),

	cover: J.select('.block_img2 img').attr('src'),

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>
